name: Test your Country Music Aptitude Multiple Choice Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the first artist to record the song 'Friends in Low Places'?
questions.explanation:
Mark Chesnutt.

	It was included on his album 'Too Cold at Home'

questions.text: Which of the following song is not about Hank Williams Sr.?
options: Are you sure hank done it this way

questions.text: Which of the following bands got their start on 'Star Search'?
questions.explanation:
Sawyer Brown.

	Sawyer Brown was the big winner of {$100,000.00}

questions.text: What are the first names of the Duo 'Brooks and Dunn'?
Which of the following was not a memeber of the 'Highwaymen'?
What song contains the following lyrics 'Could I buy you a drink'?
options: I think I'll just stay here and drink

questions.text: Who recorded the song 'I'm going hire a wino to decorate our home'?
Which Country Group had a Number 1 Disco hit in the 1970's?
questions.explanation:
Exile.

	Exile hit number 1 with the song 'Kiss you all over' then became country.

questions.text: Who originally had a hit with the Alan Jackson hit song 'Pop a Top'?
In what Garth Brooks song would you find '..the beer chases your blues away..' ?
